title: Outside the Comfort Zone (CRS025)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that the author of Sex at Dawn, Christopher Ryan, first shared on the podcast in May of 2013, about LSD, Mayan ruins, and a worrisome bug bite.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Christopher Ryan, kevin Allison)
